pages.title: Day / Night
pages.text: Level: <level_t1>$(br2)Summoned with a $(key)Chaos Orb$().$(br2)Both $(key)Day Stalker$() and $(key)Night Prowler$() carry powerful $(mechanic/hostility#spell_trait)spell traits$(). Using a $(mage/spell_container)Spell Container$() is recommended.

pages.title: Day / Night
pages.text: $(br)Defeating $(key)Day Stalker$() and $(key)Night Prowler$() drops $(key)Celestial Debris$(), which can be used to craft $(boss/t1/dragon)Celestial Luminary$().
